pages.text: Lost Souls known as $(thing)Wraiths$() occasionally break free from $(item)Soul Sand$() in the $(thing)Nether$(). Amnesiac, they are known to attack any people they see, mimicking the cries of other creatures in a vain attempt to remember who they were.
